justification: Acknowledges B’s appetite for upside/injured buys and committee RBs, but ignores B’s playoff-schedule emphasis when giving up Isaiah (friendly playoffs). The offer is an overpay by A (Tier 1 RB + WR for a Tier 2 WR) and undermines A’s urgent win-now needs and injury caution. Perspective-taking is present but shallow and not roster-specific (e.g., B’s QB/TE issues). Rationale is generic and doesn’t justify acceptance odds.
